metadata.description: This ruleset provides analysis of Maven built applications that depend on Java EE artifacts, which were replaced by Jakarta EE artifacts, starting with JBoss EAP 7.3.

hint.title: Move to Jakarta EE Maven Artifacts - com.sun.mail:javax.mail
hint.message: If you migrate your application to JBoss EAP 7.3 (or later), and want to ensure its Maven building, running or testing works as expected, use instead the Jakarta EE dependency with groupId `com.sun.mail`, and artifactId `jakarta.mail`.
